description: This table stores information regarding physicians responsible for breast imaging outcomes.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MAMMO_RESP_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique provider ID of the physician who is responsible for a breast imaging outcome for an order.

columns.name: PHYS_ASMT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The overall assessment category ID for the order made by the responsible physician.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Need Additional Imaging Evaluation


Negative


Benign


Probably Benign


Suspicious


Highly Suggestive of Malignancy


Known Biopsy-Proven Malignancy


Low Suspicion for Malignancy


Moderate Suspicion for Malignancy


High Suspicion for Malignancy

columns.name: PHYS_RIGHT_ASMT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The right assessment category ID for the order made by a responsible physician.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PHYS_ASMT_C_NAME

columns.name: PHYS_LEFT_ASMT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The left assessment category ID for the order made by a responsible physician.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PHYS_ASMT_C_NAME
